description:
While looking into the git link where https://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/d14ac4bf38f23e429572f210f7b0560493968b15#L9R581

i found that at line 621  there is mistype of 127.0.0.0.1:3260  correct value should be 127.0.0.1:3260
I saw the history on the file and it seems this looks like a mistype as 127.0.0.0.1 is invalid IP.

Thanks and Regards,
Narinder
title: upstream code has mistype in nova/volume/san.py
